firstNightReminder: Show the token of whichever demon is in play.
otherNightReminder: ? IF the demon killed the forensic scientist: show the hand symbol for how many steps.
name: Forensic Scientist
ability: You start knowing which demon is in play. If the Demon kills you, you learn how many steps they are from their nearest Minion.

firstNightReminder: Show two character tokens, one in-play and one not in-play.
otherNightReminder: ? IF the ambassador challenged today: either they or the challenged player dies.
name: Ambassador
ability: You start knowing two characters: exactly one is in-play. Once per game, you may challenge a player's public role claim. Tonight, if they were the role they claimed, you die. If not, they die.

firstNightReminder: @ The WA points to a player. Add a sympathy token to that player.
otherNightReminder: ? IF one or more players visited an alive player with a sympathy token: point to those players. ELSE: @ The WA points to a player. Add a sympathy token to that player.
name: Woodland Alliance
ability: Each night, learn which players visted an alive player with a sympathy token. If it was no one, choose a player: they receive a sympathy token.

firstNightReminder: @ Albion points to a player. Add a flag token to that player.
otherNightReminder: ? IF Albion was executed today: show the hand signal for the number of good-aligned players with a flag token. ELSE: @ Albion points to a player. Add a flag token to that player.
name: Clan Albion
ability: Each night, choose a player to place a flag token. If you are executed, learn how many good players have a flag token that night.

firstNightReminder: @ Mons Insurance points to a player. Show the hand signal for the number of tokens that player has. Add an insurance token to that player.
otherNightReminder: @ Mons Insurance points to a player. Show the hand signal for the number of tokens that player has. Add an insurance token to that player.
name: Mons Insurance
ability: Each night, choose a player: Learn how many tokens they have, then place an insurance token: If they would die from the Demon, you die instead.

otherNightReminder: @ Quarantine Specialist points to a player. Add a quarantine token on that player.
name: Quarantine Specialist
ability: Each night*, choose a player to place a quarantine token on. Evil players who target this player are drunk tonight.

otherNightReminder: ? IF there is a player that was most mad the Mad Hatter was evil, show that player's character token.
name: Mad Hatter
ability: Each night*, learn the character of the player that was the most mad you were evil yesterday, if possible.

otherNightReminder: @ Necromancer may choose to use their ability; if yes, they point to a dead player. If the Necromancer had at least one token, and that player is a townsfolk, they are now alive.
name: Necromancer
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose a dead player: If you have at least one token and they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected and you discard all your tokens.

otherNightReminder: ? IF a duplicate token was placed on the Seer today: @ the seer points to a player. Show the head signal for the alignment of the chosen player.
name: Seer
ability: At night, if you received a duplicate copy of a token, wake to choose a player. Learn their alignment, and discard all your tokens.

otherNightReminder: ? IF a minion was executed today: place the everyone drunk marker. ELSE: remove it.
name: Dionysus
ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players are drunk until dusk tomorrow. Travellers are only drunk until dawn.

name: Guard
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player and guess their character: if you are correct, they die immediately.

otherNightReminder: ? IF today was their first day: Show the head signal according to the number of evil players on the team.
name: Loyal Servant Of Arthur
ability: On your 1st day, publicly choose a team 5 players. That night, learn if the team contains 2 or more players of evil alignment.

name: Quartermaster
ability: During the day, you may publicly choose a player. If you have three or more tokens and they are evil alignment, they die, and you discard all your tokens.

otherNightReminder: ? IF the Exile was given a custom night ability, resolve it.
name: Exile
ability: On your first night, receive a quest. If you fulfill your quest, the storyteller will publicly announce a visionary is in the game. If you survive until tomorrow night, you become evil and your team wins.

name: RINNEGATO
ability: The first time you would die from the demon, don't. If you survive until the final 3 players, you may shoot the other 2 players, and win alone. You lose if you die.

otherNightReminder: ? IF the Jester was executed today, a random townsfolk dies.
name: Jester
ability: You win if executed. When executed, a random townsfolk dies tonight. You lose if you are alive at the end of the game.

otherNightReminder: ? IF it is their 3rd/4th night, wake them up, @ they choose a good character.
name: 5D Pawn
ability: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses. On your 3rd/4th (10-12/13-15p) night, choose a good character and gain that ability.

firstNightReminder: @ The Society points to a player: that player is poisoned until dusk tomorrow, add a Regret token.
otherNightReminder: @ The Society points to a player: that player is poisoned until dusk tomorrow, add a Regret token.
name: Society of Falling Light
ability: Each night, choose a player: They are poisoned until dusk. Additionally, they recieve a regret token: If they have a night ability: each subsequent night, their action or information is what it would have been the previous night.

firstNightReminder: @ The Bene Gesserit provides a hand signal. Write down which day number this is.
name: Bene Gesserit
ability: On your first night, predict on which day a Demon will be executed by a good player's nomination. If you are correct, the execution fails and the evil team wins instead. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: ? IF: the demon was executed today and 4+ players live, the Magus becomes the new demon. IF: a minion was executed today, the Magus may become that minion.
name: Magus of Cloaks
ability: At night, if a minion was executed, you may swap characters with them. If the demon is executed and at least 4 players are still alive, become the new demon.

firstNightReminder: @ The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately and lose their dead vote.
otherNightReminder: @ The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately and lose their dead vote.
name: Lisa
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die and lose one dead vote. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

otherNightReminder: @ The Demon Points to a player. That player, and all other players that visit them tonight dies.
name: The Yin Brotherhood
ability: Each night*, choose a player: that player and ALL other players who targeted them dies tonight.

otherNightReminder: @ The Demon Points to a player. That player dies. ? IF it was the learned player, they may pick a second player.
name: Deathwalker
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. When 5 or more players are alive, learn an in-play character. If you kill the learned character, you may kill a second player.

name: Secret Hitler
ability: You think you're a townsfolk, and register as that townsfolk, but aren't. Starting on your 3rd/4th (10-12p/13-15p) day, evil wins if you're executed or no alive player is executed, town wins at night if 3 or less players are alive. Up to 2 players die each night*.

otherNightReminder: @ The Demon Points to a player. That player dies, and the nearest townsfolk recieves a fear token. ? IF a player reaches 2 fear tokens for the first time this game, they die.
name: Shadows Flicker Like Flame
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The nearest alive good player receives a fear token: their abilities have no effect on you, and you register as good to them if possible. The first player with 2 fear tokens also dies.

name: Mr. Monopoly
ability: Once per game, during the day, choose any number of players: they must e-transfer you CAD$200 or be sent to jail (exiled).

name: Catan Robber
ability: The player to your left is drunk. Each day, they may attempt 2 2d6 rolls, then you may attempt 2 2d6 rolls. The first player to roll a 7 can move you anywhere.

name: UNO Reverse Card
ability: If you were funny today, you can't be exiled: if a player calls for an exile vote on you, they are exiled instead, immediately.

name: Hungry Hungry Hippo
ability: Something bad might happen to the player(s) who tapped your back the least today.

name: Spymaster
ability: Each day, once nominations open, silence a player: they may not nominate or vote today, even if you are exiled.

name: Awedish
ability: Some characters leave tokens on other players. Players may have multiple copies of the same token, but duplicate copies have no effect, except to increase token count. All tokens persist between nights, even when the character dies.
